title: New kata op
body: Hi. Im playing kata main. And with that new item shes highly op. last patch that nerfed her cooldowns was allready strong cuz she could w like twice. with +100 dmg = halflifing ashe shes by far too strong if fed

replies.body:
pls say in German beacauß this is German Forum and we likes to readd in our lenguige.
but what you have sayed is wright: in this case you can see Riots baddest balance.
